version_description:
-New content update
-Tutorial improvements
-Add new product
-UI/UX improvements
-Global Language Update

- Fixes the photo mission issue which is unable to claim the golds
- Fixes the freezing issue when the white screen is displayed while playing game
minor bug fix

Change Advertising Time
Balance Down Destination Open Cost
Destination Open Reward Change
At Fufu Tradehouse, First Slot Accessory Trading Time 60 minutes → 30 minutes (Play Ad Button appears directly

- Daily Login Reward Event function has been added.
- Improved the function so that make manage your cats more conveniently.
- Improved the item exchange function.
- Changed the UI to make it easier to level up the island.
- App SDK advertising and system stabilization update

- new feature updated -My own little home-
- updated 15th destination
- improved contents' convenience
- stabilized overall systems
